equilibrium_stability_sketches.png.description: Three small sketches showing equilibrium stability conditions: stable equilibrium (ball in valley), unstable equilibrium (ball on hill), and neutral equilibrium (ball on flat surface)

axially_loaded_beam_diagram.png.description: Axially loaded beam diagram showing a rectangular beam with length l, coordinate system with x and z axes, and axial force P applied at the right end, with EA and EJ properties labeled

infinitesimal_beam_element.png.description: Infinitesimal beam element showing deformation with coordinates x and x+dx, displacements u and u+du, transverse displacement w, and deformed length dl

equilibrium_vs_buckling_bc_comparison.pn.description: Comparison table showing equilibrium equations (BC) on left with boundary condition at x=l, and buckling equations (BC) on right with boundary condition at x=l

hinged_hinged_beam.png.description: Hinged-hinged beam configuration showing a horizontal beam with pin supports at both ends (x=0 and x=l) and axial load P applied from the right

hinged_hinged_buckled_shape.png.description: Buckled shape of hinged-hinged beam showing sinusoidal deflection curve with pin supports at both ends and axial load P

clamped_clamped_beam.png.description: Clamped-clamped beam showing horizontal beam with fixed supports at both ends (x=0 and x=l) and axial load P applied from the right

clamped_clamped_buckled_shape.png.description: Buckled shape of clamped-clamped beam showing curved deflection with fixed supports at both ends and axial load P

fixed_free_cantilever_beam.png.description: Fixed-free cantilever beam showing horizontal beam with fixed support at left end (x=0) and free end at right with axial load P

fixed_free_buckled_shape.png.description: Buckled shape of fixed-free cantilever beam showing curved deflection with fixed support at left and free end at right with axial load P
